item.title: About
item.description:
Hello, I’m Chao GAO.

I’m currently a database developer at Zilliz, working on a vector database called Milvus . I have worked/interned as a software engineer at ByteDance, Bilibili, Alibaba. Before that, I obtained a bachelor and master degree in computer science from Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2018 and 2021, respectively. During the period of my graduate study, I did some research on the optimization of query processing algorithms towards high dimensional data.

Contact me:

  • Email: dimongao96@gmail.com
  • Github: @chasingegg
  • Zhihu: @Chao.G
  • Linkedin: @Chao Gao
